description: The `v-video` component is useful for background video or as a customizable player for self-hosted content.

props.aspectRatio: Sets the aspect ratio for the playback, calculated as width/height.
props.image: Apply a specific image as cover before the video is loaded.
props.autoplay: Starts loading the media file without waiting for user to click. Playback begins once enough data is loaded.
props.muted: Hides volume control and disables the playback sound.
props.eager: Silently loades the media file without waiting for user to click.
props.noFullscreen: Disable fullscreen and hide the default fullscreen button.
props.rounded: Applies a border radius to the video container and the controls. Accepts array of two values to customize elements separately.
props.startAt: Moves progress to the specified time (in seconds) once the media file is loaded.
props.controlsProps: Pass props through to the `v-video-controls` component. Accepts an object with anything from [v-video-controls](/api/v-video-controls/#props) props, camelCase keys are recommended.
props.controlsTransition: The reveal transition applied to the VVideoControls component once the media file is loaded.
props.controlsVariant: Variant passed to the VVideoControls component.

events.loaded: Emitted when the video has loaded and is ready to be played.
events.update:progress: Emitted when the internal playback progress changes.

slots.header: Slot for additional content placed on top of the video.
slots.append: Additional content on the right within the control bar.
slots.controls: Replaces controls bar with custom content.
slots.loader: Slot used to replace loader displayed when the video is being loaded.
slots.prepend: Additional content on the left within the control bar.
slots.sources: Slot for content placed within native `<video>` element.

exposed.skipTo: Skip to specific moment in the video playback. Accepts percent value (0-100).
